ygData.subject: Re: Using Illusion Iksar
ygData.msgSnippet: There is one shaman, can t remember where off the top of my head, that doesn t like agnostic people in illusion... only one I ve found- it wasn t all that fun
ygData.messageBody:
There is one shaman, can't remember where off the top of my head, that
doesn't like agnostic people in illusion... only one I've found- it
wasn't all that fun getting... I died in about 20 seconds. He's not
around any of the quest MOBs or food/supply merchants.

--- In eqenchanters@y..., mccomb@v... wrote:
> I finally got my Illusion Iksar spell, and I'm anxious to use it in
> Cabilis. I'm agnostic, and with the illusion up, the troopers look
> upon me kindly and the crusaders are indifferent. I've heard there
> may be merchants in Cabilis who aren't so kind. Does anyone know if
> there is anyone in Cabilis I should avoid?
>
> Shaepe Shyphter,
> Level 22 High Elf Enchanter,
> Tholuxe Paells
